What factors will increase the capacitance of capacitive touch sensor?

answers.a: If the area of electrode is larger and thickness of cover material is smaller.
answers.b: If the area of electrode is larger and thickness of cover material is larger.
answers.c: If the area of electrode is smaller and thickness of cover material is smaller.
answers.d: If the area of electrode is smaller and thickness of cover material is larger.
